messages.subject: Cold Feet, Chapter 2:  Hot Wax (RK lemon, Saitou/Sano parody)
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, everyone! I ve just posted Chapter 2 of Cold Feet; this chapter is a Saitou/Sano parody (lemon).  [Chapter 1 was a Saitou/Misao parody.]
messages.messageBody:
Hi, everyone!

I've just posted Chapter 2 of Cold Feet; this chapter is a Saitou/Sano
parody (lemon). [Chapter 1 was a Saitou/Misao parody.]

http://adultfan.nexcess.net/aff/story.php?no=19431&chapter=2

I'm always trying to improve my writing; any suggestions for improvement
that you might have
would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks, and best wishes!

Kalli
